attributes.action: stop overpayment repayments of tax/child credits having to be repaid when not the fault of the individual
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all the correct information has been given and change of circumstances has been given. Any money that has been overpaid should not be able to be claimed back when not the fault of the claimant.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
